basics.name: Emir Tactuk Paulino
basics.label: FullStack with more than 4 years of experience and Innovator.
basics.summary: +4 years of experience as QA automator and FullStack, I live in Dominican Republic. I have worked on different projects both Web and automation.

work.name: BHD S.A
work.summary: Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products. Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers. Automate the internal processes of the company, guarantee the quality of the products and the continuous integration of the systems and processes.

work.name: FL Betances
work.summary: Participating in code reviews and providing constructive feedback to other developers. Analyse results and monitor usage in order to identify and troubleshoot automation framework issues and provide solutions for them.

work.name: Edu-Zone
work.summary: Create interactive widgets (mini games) with educational purpose using HTML5, CSS3, Javascript and some libreries like PhaserJs. Developing and maintaining web applications using React.js and other related technologies. Collaborating with cross-functional teams including designers, product managers, and other developers to create high-quality products. Implementing responsive design and ensuring Ebooks compatibility.

projects.name: Animation package for tailwind
projects.description: Node package with animations for taildwindcss, allows to add easy and simple animations to any project with tailwind just adding classes and a simple configuration.

projects.name: T-Shirt 3D
projects.description: 3d t-shirt creation project using threejs, where you can add a logo, texture and download the model. You can upload your own images for your logo or texture and you can also create them through AI.

projects.name: Tatuninodev
projects.description: Website created with react, where you can visualize an animated and beautiful web portfolio using various technologies and API consumption.

projects.name: Car Rent
projects.description: Web-based platform that allows users to search, book, and manage car rentals from various providers, providing a convenient and efficient solution for transportation needs.
